title: Skin disappears out of thin air?
body: My buddy gifted me star guardian poppy a while back when it launched and i just noticed that it is gone..like i got no warning or anything..just gone..will i get it back or is it just gone forever.

replies.body:
Huh....well this is weird....

I'm not seeing that this account ever had Star Guardian Poppy, or any friends sending that skin as a gift to this account. Were you thinking of a different account that had this skin? Do you remember who it was that sent it to you?
Mad Smerinoff sent me the gift and it was a mystery gift. if that helps at all
So i told him about it and he just decided to gift me the skin again..but i still don't understand why i lost it in the first place
Soooo I'm seeing that Mad sent that gift today and it was received, but they haven't sent this skin to your account before today. Could they have sent it to a different account that you own possibly?
